sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormControl, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'], }) export class AppComponent { title = 'reactive-forms'; reactivForm: FormGroup; ngOnInit() { this.reactivForm = new FormGroup({ personal firstname: new FormControl(null, Validators.required), lastname: new FormControl(null, Validators.required), email: new FormControl(null, [Validators.required, Validators.email]), gender: new FormControl('male'), country: new FormControl('uk'), hobbies: new FormControl(null), }); } onSubmit() { console.log(this.reactivForm); } }

Registration Form

The email you entered is not a valid email
